timelineEntries.description: Developed systems for an open-world game using plugin-based architecture, created Unity Editor tools (NPC/Vehicle generators) and shaders for faster iteration, and built scalable templates for casual/hyper-casual games.
Designed simulation games (racing/fighting) and shipped 5+ hyper-casual titles (100+ levels) using custom Unity tools, while leading KPI-focused prototyping to boost retention and playtime.
Optimized high-poly 3D models, developed custom LODs and editor tools, created mechanical/electrical simulations, and delivered AR/VR training solutions across Unity pipelines (URP/HDRP).
Developed AA 3D games, built a modular third-person shooter controller for Unity, and created reusable game flow templates to accelerate production.
Developed arcade/2D games, 3D simulations, and AI systems for racing games (cars/bikes).
